description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The Light of Asia; or, the Great Renunciation-Mahâbhinishkramana. Being the life and teaching of Gautama ... as told in verse by an Indian Buddhist. By E. Arnold, etc.]" Author: Arnold, Edwin - Sir Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11651.h.27." Page: 89 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1885 Publisher: Trübner & Co. Edition: [Another edition.] [With illustrations.] Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000119136 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
